briefTitle: Optimizing Postoperative Recovery After Breast Reconstruction With Autologous Tissue (BestDIEP)
officialTitle: Optimizing Postoperative Recovery After Breast Reconstruction With Autologous Tissue (BestDIEP)
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Operated or will be operated with a DIEP flap in the department
* \>18 years of age

Exclusion Criteria:

* Inability to leave informed consent
* Inability to understand and speak Swedish (for the questionnaire)
